name: Brain Defence
description:
Join the epic battle for survival in the human body, where Red Blood Cells are armed and ready to fight against vicious Viruses. As a player, you get to spawn and upgrade your own Red Blood Cells, each with unique abilities and weapons to defend against invading forces.

Strategically deploy your army of RBCs to various locations within the body, and use their weapons and skills to outwit the enemy and protect vital organs. As you progress, earn experience points and level up your RBCs to unlock new upgrades, weapons, and skills to enhance your defense.

Can you save the body from the never-ending attack of viruses? Play now and find out in this action-packed, fast-paced game of strategy and survival.
